data.name: AA1000StaticMethodsShouldNotBeVoidDescription
data.value: Static methods should return a value (must not be null)

data.name: AA1000StaticMethodsShouldNotBeVoidMessageFormat
data.value: Static method '{0}' is void. It should return a value

data.name: AA1000StaticMethodsShouldNotBeVoidTitle
data.value: AA1000-StaticMethodsShouldNotBeVoid

data.name: AA1001StaticMethodsShouldHaveAtLeastOneParameterDescription
data.value: Static methods should have at least one parameter

data.name: AA1001StaticMethodsShouldHaveAtLeastOneParameterMessageFormat
data.value: Static method '{0}' doesn't have any parameters. It should have at least one

data.name: AA1001StaticMethodsShouldHaveAtLeastOneParameterTitle
data.value: AA1001-StaticMethodsShouldHaveAtLeastOneParameter

data.name: AA1002StaticMethodsShouldNotAccessStateDescription
data.value: A static method should only derive a result from the supplied parameter(s). It should not access any static field or property

data.name: AA1002StaticMethodsShouldNotAccessStateMessageFormat
data.value: xxx

data.name: AA1002StaticMethodsShouldNotAccessStateTitle
data.value: AA1002-StaticMethodsShouldNotAccessState

data.name: AA1003StaticMethodsShouldNotCreateStateDescription
data.value: The only result from calling a static method should be the returned value, or an exception. Therefore it should not invoke any method that has no parameters and/or a void return type, nor write to any field or property.

data.name: AA1003StaticMethodsShouldNotCreateStateMessageFormat
data.value: xxx

data.name: AA1003StaticMethodsShouldNotCreateStateTitle
data.value: AA1003-StaticMethodsShouldNotCreateState

data.name: AA1100InterfacePropertiesShouldBeReadOnlyDescription
data.value: To provide encapsulation, properties should only make getters publicly available, so interfaces should not define setters for properties.

data.name: AA1100InterfacePropertiesShouldBeReadOnlyMessageFormat
data.value: Property `{0}` of interface `{1}` should not define a setter

data.name: AA1100InterfacePropertiesShouldBeReadOnlyTitle
data.value: AA1100-InterfacePropertiesShouldBeReadOnly

data.name: AA1101ClassPropertiesShouldBePubliclyReadOnlyDescription
data.value: Public classes should not provide publicly accessible setters for properties

data.name: AA1101ClassPropertiesShouldBePubliclyReadOnlyMessageFormat
data.value: Public property `{0}` of class `{1}` should not define a public setter

data.name: AA1101ClassPropertiesShouldBePubliclyReadOnlyTitle
data.value: AA1101-ClassPropertiesShouldBePubliclyReadOnly

data.name: AA1102InnerTypesMustBePrivateDescription
data.value: Inner types should be treated as implementation details and encapsulated by marking them as private

data.name: AA1102InnerTypesMustBePrivateMessageFormat
data.value: Type `{0}` is defined inside another type, so should be made private

data.name: AA1102InnerTypesMustBePrivateTitle
data.value: AA1102-InnerTypesMustBePrivate

data.name: AA1200AvoidUsingStaticFieldsDescription
data.value: Static fields introduce global state and so should be avoided

data.name: AA1200AvoidUsingStaticFieldsMessageFormat
data.value: Field `{0}` in type `{1}` should not be static

data.name: AA1200AvoidUsingStaticFieldsTitle
data.value: AA1200-AvoidUsingStaticFields

data.name: AA1201AvoidUsingStaticPropertiesDescription
data.value: Static properties introduce global state and so should be avoided

data.name: AA1201AvoidUsingStaticPropertiesMessageFormat
data.value: Property `{0}` in type `{1}` should not be static

data.name: AA1201AvoidUsingStaticPropertiesTitle
data.value: AA1201-AvoidUsingStaticProperties

data.name: AA1300ParametersShouldNotBeModifiedDescription
data.value: Parameters should be treated as immutable and not used as a mutable variables

data.name: AA1300ParametersShouldNotBeModifiedMessageFormat
data.value: xxx

data.name: AA1300ParametersShouldNotBeModifiedTitle
data.value: AA1300-ParametersShouldNotBeModified

data.name: AA1301VariablesShouldBeAssignedOnceOnlyDescription
data.value: Variables should be treated as immutable and should not be overwritten

data.name: AA1301VariablesShouldBeAssignedOnceOnlyMessageFormat
data.value: Variable {0} should be treated as immutable and should not be overwritten

data.name: AA1301VariablesShouldBeAssignedOnceOnlySuppresionMisuseDescription
data.value: Variables listed in the MutableVariable attribute should exist in the method body

data.name: AA1301VariablesShouldBeAssignedOnceOnlySuppresionMisuseMessageFormat
data.value: Variable {0} doesn't exist in the method body, so shouldn't be in the attribute

data.name: AA1301VariablesShouldBeAssignedOnceOnlySuppresionMisuseTitle
data.value: AA1301-VariablesShouldBeAssignedOnceOnly

data.name: AA1301VariablesShouldBeAssignedOnceOnlyTitle
data.value: AA1301-VariablesShouldBeAssignedOnceOnly

data.name: AA2000DoNotUseNotImplementedExceptionDescription
data.value: The NotImplementedException is a direct violation of the Liskov Substitution Principle (LSP) and so must not be used

data.name: AA2000DoNotUseNotImplementedExceptionMessageFormat
data.value: Throw statement uses the NotImplementedException, which is a violation of the LSP

data.name: AA2000DoNotUseNotImplementedExceptionTitle
data.value: AA2000-DoNotUseNotImplementedException

data.name: AA2001DoNotUseNotSupportedExceptionDescription
data.value: The NotSupportedException is a direct violation of the Liskov Substitution Principle (LSP) and so must not be used

data.name: AA2001DoNotUseNotSupportedExceptionMessageFormat
data.value: Throw statement uses the NotSupportedException, which is a violation of the LSP

data.name: AA2001DoNotUseNotSupportedExceptionTitle
data.value: AA2001-DoNotUseNotSupportedException

data.name: AA2100MethodParametersMustNotBeRefOrOutDescription
data.value: Method parameters must not use REF or OUT parameters; all results should be via a return

data.name: AA2100MethodParametersMustNotBeRefOrOutMessageFormat
data.value: Parameter `{0}` of method `{1}` must not use {2}

data.name: AA2100MethodParametersMustNotBeRefOrOutTitle
data.value: AA2100-MethodParametersMustNotBeRefOrOut

data.name: AA2101MethodTooLongDescription
data.value: A long method is likely to break the single responsibility principle by carrying out unrelated activity

data.name: AA2101MethodTooLongMessageFormat
data.value: xxxx

data.name: AA2101MethodTooLongTitle
data.value: AA2101-MethodTooLong

data.name: AA2102FileTooLongDescription
data.value: An overly long file is likely to contain a type that breaks the single responsibility principle by carrying out unrelated activity

data.name: AA2102FileTooLongMessageFormat
data.value: xxx

data.name: AA2102FileTooLongTitle
data.value: AA2102-FileTooLong

data.name: AA2103MethodShouldNotContainAndDescription
data.value: Method names that contain "And" often indicate a method is doing more than one thing. Consider refacting into two methods.

data.name: AA2103MethodShouldNotContainAndMessageFormat
data.value: Method '{0}' contains "And", which might indicate it's doing more than one thing

data.name: AA2103MethodShouldNotContainAndTitle
data.value: AA2103-MethodShouldNotContainAnd

data.name: AA2104FileMustOnlyContainOneTypeDefinitionDescription
data.value: To comply with the single responsibility principle, a file should only contain one non-private type definition.

data.name: AA2104FileMustOnlyContainOneTypeDefinitionMessageFormat
data.value: Type `{0}` is located in a file that contains other type definitions

data.name: AA2104FileMustOnlyContainOneTypeDefinitionTitle
data.value: AA2104-FileMustOnlyContainOneTypeDefinition
